name: Mobiapps
tagline: Mobility at the Heart of Your Ambitions
description: MobiApps is a multi-platform, mobile solutions and services provider for companies, based on emerging hybrid technologies. MobiApps offers you an opportunity to create your cross-platform mobile applications easily using HTML or CSS and JavaScript technologies. Also, MobiApps supports you in your digital multi-screen strategy. Our aim is to put our know-how and feedback at your disposal to assist you in the design, production, and operation of your digital services.
